contentList.content: Grants allies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SYR_CALM_EMOTIONS_ALLY">Calmed</LSTag>, and afflict enemies with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CALM_EMOTIONS">Agitated</LSTag>.

Can't <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag>, has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, and has a -1 to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, and has a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
